G

GameSaver - Class in org.klotski.coding
GameSaver create an object for saving the current game with every move,
the timer, moves counter and configuration.
It connects to [name_of_the_user].txt and writes text following this form:
GameSaver(String, int) - Constructor for class org.klotski.coding.GameSaver
Constructor that initializes the Saver with the right name of the player
GameSaver(String, int, boolean) - Constructor for class org.klotski.coding.GameSaver
Constructor that initializes the Saver with the path where to save data
